titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 50th anniversary of the Indiana Pacers' 1972-1973 American Basketball Association Championship and their third American Basketball Association Championship in 5 seasons.
A resolution recognizing the 50th anniversary of the Indiana Pacers' 1972-1973 American Basketball Association Championship and their third American Basketball Association Championship in 5 seasons.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the 50th anniversary of the Indiana Pacers' third American Basketball Association title and championship.
